author: cnbc.com
title: Westlake Chemical Partners Announce Fourth Quarter and Full Year Earnings for 2017 Conference Call
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Westlake Chemical Partners (NYSE: WLKP) will release its 2017 fourth quarter and full year earnings prior to the market opening on Tuesday, February 20, 2018. The company will host a conference call at 12:00 p.m. Eastern Time (11:00 a.m. Central Time) on the same day to discuss the earnings release.
To access the conference call, dial (855) 638-4814, or (234) 386-2848 for international callers, approximately 10 minutes prior to the scheduled start time and reference passcode 8057838.
The conference call will also be available via webcast at https://edge.media-server.com/m6/p/m3tyc2qg and the earnings release can be obtained via the company's Web page at, http://investors.wlkpartners.com/CorporateProfile .
This call will be available for replay beginning at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time and may be accessed until 11:59 p.m. Eastern Time on February 27, 2018. The replay can be accessed by calling the following numbers: Domestic callers should dial (855) 859-2056 or (404) 537-3406 for international callers. The access code at both numbers is 8057838.
About Westlake Chemical Partners:
Westlake Chemical Partners is a limited partnership formed by Westlake Chemical Corporation to operate, acquire and develop facilities for the processing of natural gas liquids as well as other qualifying activities. Headquartered in Houston, the Partnership owns a 18.3% interest in Westlake Chemical OpCo LP. Westlake Chemical OpCo LPâ€™s assets include three facilities in Calvert City, Kentucky, and Lake Charles, Louisiana which process ethane and propane into ethylene, and an ethylene pipeline. For more information about Westlake Chemical Partners LP, please visit http://www.wlkpartners.com/ .
